title: Tillandsia setacea
text: Tillandsia setacea, the southern needleleaf, is a <a href="species%20%28biology%29">species</a> in the <a href="genus%20%28biology%29">genus</a> "<a href="Tillandsia">Tillandsia</a>". It has a scattered, <a href="Disjunct%20distribution">disjunct</a> distribution in the southeastern <a href="United%20States">United States</a> (<a href="Florida">Florida</a>, <a href="Georgia%20%28U.S.%20state%29">Georgia</a>), northwestern and southern <a href="Mexico">Mexico</a> (<a href="Jalisco">Jalisco</a>, <a href="Sinaloa">Sinaloa</a>, <a href="Nayarit">Nayarit</a>, <a href="Chiapas">Chiapas</a>, <a href="Oaxaca">Oaxaca</a>, <a href="Campeche">Campeche</a>), <a href="Guatemala">Guatemala</a>, the <a href="West%20Indies">West Indies</a> (<a href="Cayman%20Islands">Cayman Islands</a>, <a href="Cuba">Cuba</a>, <a href="Hispaniola">Hispaniola</a>, <a href="Jamaica">Jamaica</a>, <a href="Puerto%20Rico">Puerto Rico</a>) and the State of <a href="Par%C3%A1">Pará</a> in northeastern <a href="Brazil">Brazil</a>.
